nodes.text: Patient power ought to be increased rather than keeping power in the hands of the doctors.
Patient power will mean giving most power to articulate well informed and pushy patients but will also improve standards
keeping power in the hands of doctors and bureaucrats on the other hand will keep standards low while being just as unequal
If a shift in power improves standards while causing no more inequality than keeping power in the hands of doctors there ought to be a shift in power.
patient power should drive up standards for everyone
giving more power to patients will mean giving the most power to articulate well-informed and pushy patients who tend to be better-off
